::KitKat::

She motioned for them all to enter the ship. "Please,  make 
yourselves comfortable.  Megatron, Aracnia, Destructor, please join 
me in the conference room."

She started to walk inside. She called the Megatron clone and ordered 
it to go the the conference room near the bridge. She smiled, and 
coudn't wait for Megatron to see himself.  She couldn't wait to see 
the look on Megatron's face.

The clone got to the conference room, it went to the far corner of 
the room and stood in the shadows, out of site. So when the others 
entered the room, they woulnd't see the clone at all.
